ActIndian Act
PrecisESKASONI BAND COUNCIL METHOD OF ELECTION REGULATIONS which give effect to a decision of the Band that its reserve (i.e., Eskasoni Indian Reserves No. 3 & 3A in Nova Scotia) should, for voting purposes, consist of one electoral section instead of five.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2004-0187 Publication Date: 2004-09-22
